front.title: GMAC and KMAC for COSE and JOSE

author.organization: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory

abstract.t: This document registers JOSE and COSE algorithm code points for using two new Message Authentication Code (MAC) algorithm families. One is the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) in Galois/Counter Mode (GCM) to generate a MAC (AES-GMAC), the other is the SHA-3-derived Keccak MAC (KMAC).
